preference.name: Scp0PartLRDDeclRevision_DefaultChildProperties
preference.preference_description:
Specifies the list of properties that can be used as child properties of the Scp0PartLRDDeclRevision object type.
Syntax: <TypeName>_DefaultChildProperties=my_property
Example: Scp0SubsCmplDocs_ DefaultChildProperties=my_property
Available OOTB properties: IMAN_reference Scp0SubsCmplDocs Scp0UsesMaterialMapping Scp0UsesLaboratory Scp0UsesSupplier Scp0UsesAnalyte Scp0LRDContactInCompany
